title: Trash Bat
lyrics:
Pulp in the slick
And you're all I take to bed
To read with me
Pulp in the slick
And you're all I take to bed

With me to



Once more with a smile

Broken teeth and bloody eyes

In my mean light

My my my

Trash Bat

Broken teeth and empty eyes

In my mean light

My my my

Trash Bat



Flies or the flames

Wear no halo 'round my head

Oh blessed be

Wear no halo 'round my head

Oh blessed be



Once more with a smile

Broken teeth and bloody eyes

In my mean light

My my my

Trash Bat



Once more with a smile

Broken teeth and empty eyes

In my mean light

My my my

Trash Bat



Keep it clean

Keep it clean for the camera

In my mean light

In my mean light

In my mean light
